title: Linux smbstatus Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux smbstatus command, learn its purpose, options, and how to analyze active SMB connections and shared resources on your system.

meta.title: Linux smbstatus Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux smbstatus command, learn its purpose, options, and how to analyze active SMB connections and shared resources on your system.
meta.keywords: Linux, smbstatus, SMB, networking, file sharing, command-line, system administration

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of smbstatus Command

verify.name: Verify smbstatus command execution
verify.hint: The `smbstatus` command should display the header "Service      pid     Machine       Connected at" in the output.

steps.title: Explore smbstatus Command Options and Flags

verify.name: Verify smbstatus command options
verify.hint: The `smbstatus --help` output should include the option "-S, --shares" to list the shared resources.

steps.title: Analyze Active SMB Connections and Shared Resources

verify.name: Verify smbstatus command for shared resources
verify.hint: The `smbstatus -S` command should display the "IPC$" shared resource.

verify.name: Verify smbstatus command for active connections
verify.hint: The `smbstatus` command should not display any active SMB connections.
